pageTitle: Roadshows for the Western Extension to the Congestion Charge

title.title: Roadshows for the Western Extension to the Congestion Charge

texts: Awareness roadshows for the western extension to the Congestion Charge will be taking place in locations throughout west London over the coming months before the scheme goes live on 19 February 2007.
The roadshows have been designed to inform people who visit, live and work in the western extension of the Congestion Charge how it may affect them and if it does what they need to do.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Monday 6 November and Tuesday 7 November, 8am to 8pm, Fulham Road SW3, located near intersection of Brompton Road and Pelham Street","Wednesday 8 November and Thursday 9 November, 8am to 8pm, Sloane Square Tube, Sloane Garden, SW1","Monday 13 November and Tuesday 14 November, 8am to 8pm, West Brompton Tube, Eardley Crescent, SW5","Wednesday 15 November and Thursday 16 November, 8am to 8pm, Gloucester Road Tube, Courtfield Road, SW7","Monday 20 November and Tuesday 21 November, 8am to 8pm, Notting Hill Gate Tube, W11, located near the intersection with Linden Gardens","Wednesday 22 November, 8am to 8pm, Portobello Road Market, W10, located just off Oxford Gardens","Thursday 23 November, 8am to 8pm, Golborne Road Market, located near junction with Elkstone Rd W10","Friday 24 November, 8am to 8pm, Saturday 25 November, 10am to 6pm, Kensington High Street, Warwick Road, W14, located just off the High Street","Also on Friday 24 November, 8am to 8pm, and Saturday 25 November, 10am to 6pm, Old Brompton Road SW5, located on the opposite side of the library","Monday 27 November and Tuesday 28 November, 8am to 8pm, Kensington Central Library, Camden Hill Road, W8","Also on Monday 27November and Tuesday 28 November, 8am to 8pm, Ifield Road, SW10, located near intersection of Fulham Rd and Ifield Rd","Wednesday 29 November and Thursday 30 November, 8am to 8pm, Sainsbury's Ladbroke Grove, 2 Canal Way, Ladbroke Grove, W10 5AA","Friday 1 December, 8am to 8pm, and Saturday 2 December, 10am to 6pm, Sainsbury's Cromwell Road, Collingham Place, SW5","Also Friday 1 December, 8am to 8pm, and Saturday 2 December, 10am to 6pm, Kings Road, SW10 ,located at bottom end of Kings Road near Gunther Grove"]}
